Action buttons' helper classes

Primary and secondary buttons have an automatic width, according with the content text. It's possible to use 'full width' or 'fixed width' options.

Full width buttons

Full width buttons have an imposed 100% width, so that they fit to the width of their parent.

Full width

Fixed size action buttons

Fixed size buttons have a 15rem width and 3.75rem height by default. These values can be changed in _config.scss, or, obviously, overriden for specific cases in your custom stylesheets.

Fixed sized button: line is broke
